caption: In this video, we see the story of Spider-Man who finds himself trapped in another universe. There, he meets a college student who also becomes Spider-Man. They adventure together, and the college student learns a lot from Spider-Man. In the end, they find some clues and prepare to protect the world. Highlights: Spider-Man and the college student find themselves trapped in another universe. The college student also becomes Spider-Man, and they embark on an adventure together. Spider-Man teaches the college student a lot. They discover some clues and prepare to protect the world. Both Spider-Man and the college student possess a rare collectible. The college student is Spider-Man's only friend after his passing. Spider-Man and the college student share similarities in important aspects. In every universe, Gwen Stacy falls for Spider-Man.

global.question: Is it a video based on reality or not?(Is it a cartoon movie?)
global.answer: No. It seems like an animated movie.
